settings.text: A lightweight leave-in cream that adds moisture and smooths frizz.
Wake up to smoother, shinier hair with our luxuriously soft, 4U Bonnet designed to improve overall hair health, protect curly styles, and lock in moisture.

settings.heading: Details
settings.content:
Limited time only: 4U Bonnet FREE with bundle purchase.

Our ultra-soft, breathable bonnet was designed to protect your curls, prevent breakage, and lock in moisture so your hair can flourish while you sleep.

Bonus: Who said bonnets are only for sleeping? Our 4U Bonnet was stylishly designed to be worn outside the bedroom. Wear it while conditioning your curls or to disguise a not-so-great hair day. Stay chic and preserve your curls while you conquer your day.

Benefits:
Lightweight and breathable
Reduces frizz
Protects hairstyles overnight
Locks in and maintains moisture
Prevents friction that causes
breakage
Adjustable fit
Gentle on all hair types

settings.heading: How to use
settings.content:
Flip hair upside down and place hands on either side of the bonnet. Hook the scrunched side of the bonnet (with the tag) to the back of your head and stretch the bonnet over your hair. Gather ends into bonnet and adjust band if needed.

For Protecting Curly Styles: Put your hair into a pineapple method, two high puffs, or leave it loose. Cover your hair with the bonnet and ensure all strands are tucked in.

For Deep Conditioning:After coating your hair with a deep conditioning mask, place a plastic cap over your hair. Then follow by covering your hair with the bonnet. Great to use for an overnight mask as well!

settings.heading: Results
settings.content:
1. 69% reduction in frizz after 24 hours
2. Retains curls for 24 hours
3. Thermal Protection up to 450 degrees
4. 82% more glossy

*Based on a 21-day study of 35 subjects, used daily.

settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content:
Clean Ingredients: 96.6% naturally derived

Water/Aqua/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, C13-15 Alkane*, Glycerin, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Squalane, Brassicamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract**, Panthenol, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Oil, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Tocopherol, Cassia Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Aspartic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Sodium Gluconate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Fragrance/Parfum, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Methyl Ionone, Limonene, Linalool

*Hemi15 (Hemisqualane)
**Flaxseed

settings.content:
Weâ€™re happy to offer free standard shipping (Est. Delivery 3-5 Business Days) for all US orders $30+.

We also ship to PO Boxes (Est. Deliver 5-7 Business Days).

Free 30 day returns on all US orders.

settings.title: How to Use
settings.text: After cleansing, use a comb to evenly distribute product through damp hair. Air-dry or use a diffuser to achieve nourished, detangled curls with definition and  movement.
